This is a personal website I created to host various analyses and programming tasks I've completed in the professional world. There is a GitHub repository containing some more examples at https://github.com/cmh-sample/Code_Samples.

This is certainly a work in progress! Currently the FFT tab will take you to a tutorial on using and understanding the fast fourier transform. The FFT Example tab will take you to an interactive tutorial and example of a real-world use-case of FFT.
